description:
Newly renovated apartment located in the Wakefield neighborhood of the Bronx.

Train Transportation Information Below.

The calendar is updated. Please feel free to 'Instant Book'.

This is a brand new construction. The apartment is new and also everything inside of it.

Guests will have access to the entire apartment - It is a private rental: Master Bedroom, the bathroom, the kitchen and the living room.

A code to the front door will be provided. Guests can easily enter and leave the property as they please during their stay.

Parking: 
The property has a private driveway for 1 car. There are two Airbnbs on the same property and parking is given on a first come first served basis. 
Please reach out and confirm before booking if parking is a must. 
If the driveway is not available, please be assured that it is a residential area and there is plenty of free street parking right by the house.

Please feel free to text / call me if needed. My goal is to make your stay a pleasurable one.

Train Stations By The House

There are 2 train stations by the house:

️There is the local train (2&5 train) that is a 5-7 mins walk from the house. That train will take you to the center of the city in 50mins to 1hour.

️There is an express train (the Metro North) that is a 15mins walk from the house, or a 5mins cab ride from the house, that will take you to 42nd in 25mins.

There is one flight of stairs to get into the apartment.
name: Uptown NYC 1-Bedroom Apartment
review: It was amazing and better than expected and a very spacious apartment.
